description.emerald:
The user becomes soaked to
raise resistance to fire.
description.ruby-sapphire:
The user becomes soaked to
raise resistance to fire.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Weakens FIRE-type
attacks while the
user is in the
battle.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user soaks itself
with water. The move
weakens Fire-type
moves while the user
is in the battle.
description.platinum:
The user soaks itself
with water. The move
weakens Fire-type
moves while the user
is in the battle.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user soaks itself
with water. The move
weakens Fire-type
moves while the user
is in the battle.
description.black-white:
The user soaks itself with water. The move
weakens Fire-type moves while the user
is in the battle.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user soaks itself with water. The move
weakens Fire-type moves while the user
is in the battle.
description.x-y:
The user soaks itself with water.
This weakens Fire-type moves
for five turns.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user soaks itself with water.
This weakens Fire-type moves
for five turns.
description.sun-moon:
The user soaks the battlefield with water. This
weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user soaks the battlefield with water. This
weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user soaks the battlefield with water. This
weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.
